channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Yes to Play 1971 Album ‘Fragile’ in Full on U.S. Tour
item.description: 🎸 Get ready to rock out with Yes as they perform 'Fragile' live on their U.S. tour! 🤘 #ClassicRock #MusicNews

item.title: Billie Eilish Breaks, Mends Our Hearts With ‘The Only Exception’ Paramore Cover
item.description: 🎶 Billie Eilish's soulful rendition of Paramore's 'The Only Exception' is the heart-healer we all need right now! ❤️ #BillieEilish #NewMusicDiscovery

item.title: Pile – “Uneasy”
item.description: Dive into the emotional rollercoaster with @pilemusic's latest track "Uneasy" 🎶💫 Let the music move you!

item.title: Irish band Cardinals share new single “Big Empty Heart,” announce North American tour dates
item.description: 🎶 Let's dance our way across North America with Cardinals’ catchy new single and tour dates! Who's joining? 🌟 #CardinalsOnTour

item.title: Digable Planets announce ‘Blowout Comb’ 30th anniversary tour
item.description: 🚀 Groovy news alert! Digable Planets are hitting the road for 'Blowout Comb' 30th anniversary tour! Who's ready to vibe with us? 🎶✨ #DigablePlanets #BlowoutComb30
